data_table.description: The dataset represents variables used to collect information at randomization and at quarterly follow-up visits. The variables represent information about diabetes management, adherence to treatment plan, diabetes-related complications, usage of (non-diabetes) medications, general physical and lifestyle measurements (e.g. height, weight, smoking, exercise). (Used through September '90)

variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: Form date as SAS date value

variable.name: FORM
variable.description: DCCT form number

variable.name: BAC61A
variable.description: Infusion pump: preprandial - number of self blood glucose monitorings actually done

variable.name: BAC61B
variable.description: Infusion pump: preprandial - number of self blood glucose monitorings that should have been done

variable.name: BAC61C
variable.description: Infusion pump: preprandial - number of self blood glucose monitorings below 70mg/dl

variable.name: BAC61D
variable.description: Infusion pump: preprandial - number of self blood glucose monitorings above 120mg/dl

variable.name: BAC62A
variable.description: Infusion pump: postprandial - number of self blood glucose monitorings actually done

variable.description: Infusion pump: postprandial - number of self blood glucose monitorings below 70mg/dl

variable.name: BAC62D
variable.description: Infusion pump: postprandial - number of self blood glucose monitorings above 180mg/dl

variable.name: BAI1
variable.description: Medications: average number per month of aspirin - containing (or other prostaglandin inhibiting) tablets

variable.name: BAL7G
variable.description: Day of Profilset receipt: results of self blood glucose monitoring (mg/dl) - bedtime

variable.name: BAQURDAT
variable.description: Date of last completed visit

variable.name: BAG3CDAT
variable.description: Starting date of last menstrual period

variable.name: BAPEDATE
variable.description: Date of last physical examination

variable.name: BABLPDAT
variable.description: Date of second sitting blood pressure reading

variable.name: BACOLDAT
variable.description: Date collections were performed (Profilset)

variable.name: BAPRFDAT
variable.description: Date profileset has been mailed

variable.name: BAHBDATE
variable.description: Date blood sample was mailed to hemoglobin-A1c laboratory

variable.name: BALPDATE
variable.description: Date lipid specimens will be drawn

variable.name: BARENDAT
variable.description: Date renal specimen will be collected

variable.name: BAMADATE

variable.name: BATERMDA

variable.name: BATRANDA

variable.name: BANBDATE
variable.description: Date of termination to inactive status

variable.name: BAPERMDA
variable.description: Date permission was received to modify treatment regimen

variable.name: BASTDATE
variable.description: Date new regimen was started

variable.name: BARETDAT
variable.description: Date of return to one or two daily injections of insulin

variable.name: BAEFFDAT
variable.description: Since last visit: date the new goals became effective

variable.name: BAEXPDAT
variable.description: Since last visit: are stated goals in effect at present? If no, enter date patient returned to goals of experimental treatment

variable.name: BAWEIGHT

variable.description: Patient's desired weight

variable.name: BAHEIGHT
variable.description: Current height (cm)

variable.name: BAHTCHA
variable.description: Change in height (cm)

variable.name: BAE3
variable.description: Standard Therapy: patient performs self blood glucose monitoring

variable.description: Standard Therapy: patient performs urine glucose monitoring

variable.name: BAE6
variable.description: Patient performs more glucose monitoring (urine/blood) than prescribed

variable.name: BAE7
variable.description: Glucose monitoring (urine/blood) results suspected to be inaccurate

variable.name: BAF1A
variable.description: How often has patient claimed to follow meal plan?

variable.name: BAF1B
variable.description: Does patient have an eating disorder?

variable.name: BAF1CI
variable.description: How many illnesses did patient experience?

variable.name: BAF1CII
variable.description: How often (during illnesses) did patient fail to adjust the insulin dose as prescribed?

variable.name: BAF1D
variable.description: Patient has used a type of insulin not prescribed

variable.name: BAF1E
variable.description: Patient has rotated the site of injection

variable.name: BAF1F
variable.description: Patient has completed less than seven blood collections

variable.name: BAF1GI
variable.description: Number of intercurrent events experienced

variable.name: BAF1GII
variable.description: Number of intercurrent events patient failed to report

variable.name: BAF1H
variable.description: Patient failed to bring daily record

variable.name: BAF1II
variable.description: Patient performs self blood glucose monitoring

variable.name: BAF1III
variable.description: Patient uses self blood glucose monitoring to adjust insulin dosage

variable.name: BAF1IIII
variable.description: Patient performs self blood glucose monitoring more than once a day

variable.name: BAF2A
variable.description: Standard treatment group: on how many days has patient taken more insulin than prescribed?

variable.name: BAF2B
variable.description: Standard treatment group: on how many days has patient used additional injections of insulin?

variable.name: BAF2C
variable.description: Standard treatment group: on how many days has patient used fewer injections of insulin?

variable.name: BAF2D
variable.description: Standard treatment group: on how many days has patient failed to take prescribed insulin?

variable.name: BAF2E
variable.description: Standard treatment group: on how many days has patient failed to perform two urine and one blood test?

variable.name: BAF2FI
variable.description: Standard treatment group: on how many days has patient been ill?

variable.name: BAF2FII
variable.description: Standard treatment group: on how many days has patient failed to test/record urine acetone during illness?

variable.name: BAF3A
variable.description: Hyperglycemia - experimental treatment group: on how many days has patient failed to follow prescribed algorithm for insulin delivery?

variable.name: BAF3B
variable.description: Hyperglycemia - experimental treatment group: how many times has patient failed to do the prescribed 3 A.M. blood test?

variable.name: BAF3C
variable.description: Hyperglycemia - experimental treatment group: how many times has patient failed to report low 3 A.M. blood glucose?

variable.name: BAF3D
variable.description: Hyperglycemia - experimental treatment group: how many times has patient failed to monitor urine acetone (when blood glucose >240mg/dl)?

variable.name: BAF4A
variable.description: Hyperglycemia - experimental treatment group - infusion pump: how many times has patient failed to follow instructions for changing batteries?

variable.name: BAF4B
variable.description: Hyperglycemia - experimental treatment group - infusion pump: how many times has patient failed to follow instructions for changing catheters?

variable.name: BAF4C
variable.description: Hyperglycemia - experimental treatment group - infusion pump: how many times has patient failed to follow instructions for changing syringes?

variable.name: BAG1A
variable.description: How many nights in past week did patient wake up once to urinate?

variable.name: BAG1B
variable.description: How many nights in past week did patient wake up two or more times to urinate?

variable.name: BAG1C
variable.description: Number of eight-oz. glasses of fluid consumed per day

variable.name: BAG1D
variable.description: Hyperglycemia: how many times did patient experience diabetic ketoacidosis?

variable.name: BAG1E
variable.description: Hyperglycemia: did patient experience other symptoms of hyperglycemia?

variable.name: BAG2
variable.description: Hyperglycemia: how many days did patient experience moderate or large ketonuria?

variable.name: BAG2A
variable.description: Hyperglycemia: how many of the ketonuria days were explained by change in routine?

variable.name: BAG2B
variable.description: Hyperglycemia: how many of the ketonuria days were due to illness?

variable.name: BAG2C
variable.description: Hyperglycemia: how many of the ketonuria days were due to medical equipment failure?

variable.name: BAG2D
variable.description: Hyperglycemia: how many of the ketonuria days were spontaneous or unexplained?

variable.name: BAG3A
variable.description: Hyperglycemia: patient is female

variable.name: BAG3BI
variable.description: Hyperglycemia: patient has experienced vaginal itching or discharge

variable.name: BAG3BII
variable.description: Hyperglycemia: patient has been treated for vaginal itching or discharge

variable.name: BAG3CI
variable.description: Hyperglycemia: patient menstruates

variable.name: BAG3DI
variable.description: Hyperglycemia: last menstrual period has been more than five weeks ago

variable.name: BAG3DII
variable.description: Hyperglycemia: pregnancy test has been performed

variable.name: BAG3DIII
variable.description: Hyperglycemia: test indicated pregnancy

variable.name: BAG4A
variable.description: Hypoglycemia: number of hospitalizations for hypoglycemia

variable.name: BAG4BI
variable.description: Hypoglycemia: how many times has patient experienced hypoglycemia severe enough to lose consciousness - without seizure occurrence?

variable.name: BAG4BII
variable.description: Hypoglycemia: how many times has patient experienced hypoglycemia severe enough to lose consciousness - with seizure occurrence?

variable.name: BAG4CI
variable.description: Hypoglycemia: how many times has patient required professional medical assistance?

variable.name: BAG4CII
variable.description: Hypoglycemia: how many times has patient required the assistance of another person (e.g. to administer glucagon)?

variable.name: BAG4CIII
variable.description: Hypoglycemia: how many times has patient experienced hypoglycemia severe enough as to require the assistance of another person (other than listed under questions bag4ci and bag4cii)?

variable.name: BAG4DI
variable.description: Hypoglycemia: when did severe hypoglycemia occur?

variable.name: BAG4DIIA
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia - usual reason: missed meal or snack

variable.name: BAG4DIIB
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia - usual reason: decreased intake at meal or snack

variable.name: BAG4DIIC
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia - usual reason: increased exercise level

variable.name: BAG4DIID
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia - usual reason: too much insulin taken

variable.name: BAG4DIIE
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia - usual reason: lack of low blood glucose warning signs

variable.name: BAG4DIIF
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia - usual reason: other

variable.name: BAG4DIIG
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia - usual reason: unexplained

variable.name: BAG4DII1
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia - symptoms: adrenergic warning symptoms

variable.name: BAG4DII2
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia - symptoms: diaphoresis (sweating)

variable.name: BAG4DII3
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia - symptoms: altered mental status

variable.name: BAG4DII4
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia - symptoms: loss of consciousness

variable.name: BAG4DII5
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia - symptoms: seizure

variable.name: BAG4DII6
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia - symptoms: other

variable.name: BAG4DII7
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia - symptoms: none

variable.name: BAG4DIV
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia - how many times did patient receive glucagon?

variable.name: BAG4DV
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia - how many times did patient receive i.v. glucose?

variable.name: BAG4DVI
variable.description: Severe hypoglycemia - did any of the episodes result in injury to the patient or others?

variable.name: BAG4E
variable.description: Hypoglycemia - how many times per week did patient experience hypoglycemia mild enough to treat him/herself?

variable.name: BAG4FI
variable.description: Hypoglycemia - when did mild hypoglycemia occur?

variable.description: Mild hypoglycemia - usual reason: increased exercise level

variable.description: Mild hypoglycemia - usual reason: too much insulin taken

variable.description: Mild hypoglycemia - usual reason: lack of low blood glucose warning signs

variable.name: BAG4FII6
variable.description: Mild hypoglycemia - usual reason: other

variable.name: BAG4FII7
variable.description: Mild hypoglycemia - usual reason: unexplained

variable.name: BAG4FIIA
variable.description: Mild hypoglycemia - symptoms: adrenergic warning symptoms

variable.name: BAG4FIIB
variable.description: Mild hypoglycemia - symptoms: diaphoresis (sweating)

variable.name: BAG4FIIC
variable.description: Mild hypoglycemia - symptoms: altered mental status

variable.name: BAG4FIID
variable.description: Mild hypoglycemia - symptoms: other

variable.name: BAG4FIIE
variable.description: Mild hypoglycemia - symptoms: none
